website_summaries.verdict: This active and adorable Simba talks, purrs, wags his tail, blinks, eats, bounces, and so much more, making this the ultimate gift for Lion King fans.
pros: Responds to touch and sound with over 100 reactions
Includes grub on a stick for feeding time
Roars and says many cute phrases

website_summaries.verdict: This interactive plush toy brings the magic of The Lion King to life with Simba's lovable mannerisms and phrases.
pros: Activated by touch and speech for an unforgettable interactive experience
Roars, talks, moves, and even munches on grubs
Boasts over 100 sound and combinations to keep kids guessing
Ultra realistic and beautifully soft to the touch
cons: Not suitable for children under the age of 4

website_summaries.verdict: This adorable talking and moving toy looks just like baby Simba from the Lion King, and appeals to kids of different ages that love Disney, plush toys, and interactive play.
pros: Young Simba toy from the popular Disney movie that responds to your child with more than 100 sounds and motions
Kids love how it roars and talks
It's also soft and has a cute facial expression
cons: Rare reports of the box having signs of damage upon arrival, but few complaints about the toy itself

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is the most adorable thing ever. It is a lot bigger than expected. My 18mo old is obsessed with lions and is constantly growling like a lion. This interactive toy is perfect for him. He was so fascinated with with it.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing I’ve seen in a long time. The movement of the entire thing is realistic, his eyes make his face so expressive. Highly recommend Simba. I almost got the furreal tiger last year and it sold out before I could get one. I’m so glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my grandsons and I’m so happy I did! I got them on sale at $49.99 and that’s a great price, I knew I had to grab them... they are $100 at the Disney store. This interactive simba is so cute, soft and a pretty good size! I can’t wait till Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Soft. A little creepy in my opinon but my 5 year old loves it haha
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Furry...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful interaction with the other animals. My granddaughters reaction . Beautiful toy , soft furr.
customer_reviews.author: Nilda Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I thought. Can’t wait to gift my son with it for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.  Eyelids stopped working on day 2.
customer_reviews.text: This tiger is very soft, works and moves very realistic. The speaker is very high quality. I bought two of these for my kids for christmas. They talk to them like they are understanding what they say. The burping after eating the grub makes them laugh. Two days after xmas my youngest simba doesnt open his eyelids anymore. Sad to see these dont hold up passed 48 hours. Very expensive to not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Heiss

customer_reviews.title: Disney The Lion King
customer_reviews.text: This lion is so beautiful. Haven't opened it yet because it's a Christmas present for my 85yr. old mom. She gas Alzheimer's. We bought he the Cubby the curious bear for her birthday last month. She has not put it down. I know she will love The Lion King as well. It is just so so cute. Anyone would enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Q. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Cutest thing I’ve ever seen
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought this for our adult daughter who, like her parents, adores the new Lion King movie. Her den is decorated in an African motif and he fit right in. We have payed with Simba for hours on end. It’s hilarious watching our cat interact with it. It’s a great gift for anyone of any age who loves the Lion King.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a CHRISTMAS WIN for my 3 year old. I caught myself playing with it. Durable and works exactly as advertised. This has a great wow factor for kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase and SO soft!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not usually a fan of animatronics, but my daughter really wanted a pet and this was as close as I was willing to get right now. The cat is much cuter in person than I expected! He is so soft, sometimes it feels like petting a real cat. I will say he doesn't do as much as I was expecting, but still enough to make it worth the purchase. I like that the on and off switch is easily accessible, so I can save on batteries since it does take 4 C's. He sounds just like simba and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Cute & soft
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable!! The same idea as all the other talking toys lol. This one moves a bit and roars. Every year my child asks for one for Xmas, uses it on Xmas day and then never touches it again. So i was glad that this one was fairly inexpensive compared to everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Needham

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve bought brand new. Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 eldest children received Furreal pets for Christmas, rendering my third and youngest absolutely heartbroken. So I purchased the Simba for him at what I thought was an awesome discounted price. “Item will come in like new condition, in original packaging. Packaging will be damaged.” Only to find out his treat was missing. Was a huge bummer. Now I’m on my way to target to try to find some cheap plastic play vegetables in hopes of rectifying this for my little man.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Shain

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after the batteries were replaced
customer_reviews.text: Our kids loved it, but the first time I had to replace the batteries, it stopped working completely. I've tried replacing the batteries multiple times with different batteries and it won't start.
customer_reviews.author: The Spicer Family

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product box.
customer_reviews.text: Outside box was not damaged, but product packaging was damaged on top, side, and bottom. Obviously packed with damaged box. Very, very disapointed! Christmas gift for granddaughter. Not happy at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Landry

customer_reviews.title: Just lovely
customer_reviews.text: Caught this for a very good price ($35- originally $99) and bought 2 of them for the kids. It's my kitty obsessed daughters favorite, because well... simba is a giant kitty basically. We have alot of furreal friends and are fans of how cute they are and their interactions. This one is an awesome addition to our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit overpriced...
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard on the inside, easy for its back legs to get off alignment... now it wont even stand with its legs...and commends are not very responsive.... sorry, I really like Simba and it's abosolutely adaorable and its skin is soft.. just the inside structure.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Though it was a gift for my daughter, I love its cuteness, softness My daughter is in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the one item my daughter wanted for Christmas! I had no idea it was gonna be as big as it is. But it works great, hes soft, has many sayings and fun things to do. For the price though you would think it would come with batteries. My dauhhter loves to have a roaring contest with him. There is an on/off button which is nice. He also hums to music which is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Great. Big.
customer_reviews.text: Child loves it. It’s very LARGE, like a big French Bulldog large. Not a bad thing but surprising. The battery pack & power switch are not easily accessible. I mean this in a good way, in that kids can’t get at the batteries or the on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Hakuna Matata, you’ve found the best gift!
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing toy. My simba loving daughter loves it. She got it for Christmas and I was pretty impressed. We have several Fur Real pets and this is by far the best one. If you have a Simba/lion lover this is the perfect gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: MCMK

customer_reviews.title: very adorable
customer_reviews.text: very young toddlers don't really know how to play with this and may be too rough with it. But it is cute and adorable. Gave 2 as gifts to grandkids. Got it one here for great price $49.99
customer_reviews.author: Beverly  Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our grandson. It is amazing how it know when you touch its head. All the kids love it. But it does keep their attention for very long, maybe about 10 or 15 minutes. The grandson does come back and plays wit it from time to time. So it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randall G.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Present
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my niece. It was a big hit when she opened her presents. I think her grandfather and my other brothers enjoyed playing with it as much as she did. The perfect present!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should..got it for a gift and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: BobbiJean

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I huge hit Christmas morning!! Hours of play already! My daughter loves lions and lion king!! So this seemed like a sure thing and it sure was!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Meeker

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it did more. For a very young child, it’s fine, but for any older and it’s juvenile. With tech where it is today I wish he walked or moved more.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is adorable. I wish it did a few more things though, or maybe walked. I feel like just those two things would make this toy perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Need to lower the price so everyone can purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product itself get 5 star for sure it is super cute and fun. I got it on a good deal for Christmas, otherwise I will never pay 100$ for it it, price is not reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Simba knows how to roar!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, our almost 4-year old Granddaughter loved it. I would highly recommend purchasing Simba.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to granddaughter for her 7th birthday. It was a huge hit. She loved it. Child attendees at the party, ages 4 to 10 years, all loved it and added it to their Christmas wish lists.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Warren

customer_reviews.title: May be frightening to child aged 2
customer_reviews.text: I loved it's softness and gentleness. Motion is realistic. I'm waiting for my 2 yr old grandson to fall in love with it! I know he will.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: We love Simba
customer_reviews.text: Our kids LOVE their interactive Simba. He is used from AM to PM every day. Great quality and fun for all ages!

customer_reviews.title: Simba
customer_reviews.text: This toy I love. My granddaughter loved this toy she could not get a enough of this toy.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this it was a Christmas gift she was thrilled

customer_reviews.title: Interactive and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy for any young child. My daughter loves how Simba interacts and sings

customer_reviews.title: Very goodly
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box and it started chasing me down the block because I wouldn’t roar back!

customer_reviews.title: Lion king lovers only!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters 4th birthday. She absolutely loves it. The moves and sounds are so realistic. Good quality!!!

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the replay value
customer_reviews.text: As with most animatronics, this is not a cuddly plush. There are some sensors that cause the lion to “interact” with you. Kids lost interest after a short period.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these (for my 3 and 6 yr olds) and they love them! He sings, purrs, talks, eats, roars back when they roar at him. Can’t beat the price at $30!

customer_reviews.title: So soft and well made!!
customer_reviews.text: This is ADORABLE and made an excellent Christmas present to a lion king fan!!

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful exciting Christmas present for a 3-4 year old. Only complaint it could be lighter, weight wise.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. She will sit there and roar at it just to hear it make noise. The noises are great, and the way it moves is entertaining.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Really cool- my 18mo was a little spooked by the movements when it first"came to life", but she warmed up to it and now she can't stop cuddling it and playing with it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lion King Interactive Toy!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!

product_meta.title: Hasbro Disney The Lion King Mighty Roar Simba Interactive Plush Toy, Brought to Life by Furreal, 100+ Sound &-Motion Combinations, Ages 4 & Up
product_meta.description:
Style:StandardThe Disney the Lion King mighty roar Simba interactive plush toy embodies all the fun, charm, and humor of animation most famous Lion Cub – and now he can come along with you on all new adventures! Roar at each other (who's the loudest?), play together, and give him his treat (you may prefer, umm, a different snack for yourself!). and be sure to give your pride lands pal lots of hugs after all, even a King likes to cuddle!

disney
furreal and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: A young King who wants to roar, talk, & play: he loves to say phrases from the movie, challenge you to roaring contests, and lean back to show you he's ready to play
Responds to touch and sound with 100+ sound-and-motion combinations: he can move his head, eyes, ears, mouth, legs, & tail, and makes lots of fun movie sounds
He's full of surprises: pat him on the head -- who knows what he'll say or do? Talk to him, roar at him, and watch him react
Feed him his favorite treat: you guessed it – a grub on a stick – and mighty roar Simba responds when you feed it to him (as he likes to say, “slimy, yet satisfying”)
Fantastic Gift for birthday or holiday: for kids ages 4 and up… and any fan of the Lion King

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars809 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
